    • Field Detail

      • CONSTRUCTOR_CACHE

        protected static final java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?>> CONSTRUCTOR_CACHE
        Cache of constructors for each class. Pins the classes so they can't be garbage collected until ReflectionUtils can be collected.
